RelatedSentence: A 51 - year - old man suffering from chest pains was hospitalized after being rescued from a boat in Long Creek off Freeport Sunday , police said .
A 51 - year - old man suffering from chest pains was hospitalized after being rescued from a boat in Long Creek off Freeport Sunday , police said .

Nassau County police said the rescue occurred after a 911 call at 8:40 p.m. A police helicopter located the boat and a Marine unit crew then rescued the man , transporting him to Guy Lombardo Marina , where he was taken to a hospital by Nassau County Ambulance .

The man 's boat was towed to an area marina , police said .
